holidays.title: World Cloud Security Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness about the emerging threats facing individuals and organizations as a result of remote work and bring your own device (BYOD) policies.

holidays.title: World Party Day
holidays.description: The motto for this day is “pass the food and turn up the music." So gather your friends and stock up on supplies.

holidays.title: A Drop of Water is a Grain of Gold
holidays.description: Today we encourage you to treasure every single drop of water you have.

holidays.title: American Circus Day
holidays.description: On American Circus Day, we’re running away and joining the circus. Just kidding.

holidays.title: Armenian Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Give them extra hugs on Armenian Appreciation Day if you have Armenian friends.

holidays.title: Birth Anniversary of National Artist Lino Brocka
holidays.description: Discover how politics and theatre combine to revive a very significant Asian nation.

holidays.title: Community Garden Week
holidays.description: It’s time to get your hands dirty, let’s celebrate Community Garden Week!

holidays.title: Don't Go to Work Unless it's Fun Day
holidays.description: Take some time off on this day and get much-needed rest — with permission!

holidays.title: Fan Dance Day
holidays.description: In Japanese culture, fans are suitable for more than just keeping cool.

holidays.title: Fish Fingers and Custard Day
holidays.description: Fish Fingers and Custard Day is named after Matt Smith's Eleventh Doctor's unusual cuisine.

holidays.title: Holy Monday
holidays.description: Learn how to observe Holy Monday and honor Jesus Christ’s life and his sacrifice.

holidays.title: Independent Artist Day™
holidays.description: We’re celebrating the global community of independent artists and their unparalleled creativity.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Mousse Day
holidays.description: Decadent chocolate mousse facts served to you with a garnish of interesting history.

holidays.title: National Film Score Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the work of talented music composers by tuning into their iconic film scores.

holidays.title: National Find a Rainbow Day
holidays.description: On this colorful holiday we can really find time to explore and relish in one of nature's greatest beauties.

holidays.title: National Grey Day
holidays.description: Today let’s talk about all things grey — from fictional characters to celebrities and ordinary folks.

holidays.title: National Inspiring Joy Day
holidays.description: Sit back, read, and learn about our best activities for finding and spreading joy.

holidays.title: National Pro-Life T Shirt Day
holidays.description: Go on, put on your favorite pro-life tee and go out to declare your stance.

holidays.title: National Tweed Day
holidays.description: Put on some comfy tweed as we unravel the mystery surrounding this special holiday.

holidays.title: NCCA Anniversary
holidays.description: Learn the history of this culture and arts commission and the events they’ve got planned today.

holidays.title: Paraprofessional Appreciation Day
holidays.description: In an ever-changing environment, the roles of paraprofessionals are now more critical than ever.

holidays.title: Pony Express Day
holidays.description: Get together with your friends and family, and celebrate the pioneer spirit of the Ancient West!

holidays.title: Weed Out Hate Day
holidays.description: Today, show the world that love triumphs over hatred by taking a stand against it.

holidays.title: Amanda Bynes’s Birthday
holidays.description: Schizophrenia and bipolar disorder reportedly fueled Amanda Bynes’ erratic behavior and proved challenging for her career.

holidays.title: Amber Pike’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her on-screen persona is just a glimpse of her, there's so much more to this reality star.

holidays.title: Eddie Murphy’s Birthday
holidays.description: The work of this amazing and talented award-winning actor and musician really speaks for itself.

holidays.title: Emily Dobson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Already a big name in entertainment, yet Emily has barely even started!

holidays.title: Giannina Milady Gibelli’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get more cameras, we can’t get enough of Gianna Gibelli — the reality T.V. star.

holidays.title: Kelsey Weier’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is just the beginning of a flourishing career for this influential and charming media personality.

holidays.title: Paris Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented model and actress has created her success away from her father's shadow.

holidays.title: Sandra Boynton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented author’s work has touched the hearts of the younger generation.

holidays.title: Young M.A’s Birthday
holidays.description: Young M.A is at the pinnacle of her profession, but her journey there wasn’t easy.
